name: Prototime
description:
Prototime is a game where enemies move when you're not moving and vice versa.

This game is my entry for Minimalistic Jam 3.

Every 5 seconds game changes state between 'Run' and 'Shoot'. When the game is in 'Run' state you need to move, because if you don't, you'll lose health. When the game is in 'Shoot' state you are allowed to shoot enemies.

To regenerate health you can collect pills, which spawn from time to time.

Prototime features two types of enemies.

Controls:

  • Use 'W' and 'S' keys to move
  • Use mouse to aim

Follow me on Twitter to see my future projects.
